UnitType.Quote: 'With fire in our hearts who can stand against us?'
'Though made to serve we made ourselves more.'
UnitType.Backstory: "I don't care about your plans and schemes. I Don't give a damn 'bout your righteous dreams. All that I do, I do for myself. I never cared for anyone else."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "I don't care about your plans and schemes. I Don't give a damn 'bout your righteous dreams. All that I do, I do for myself. I never cared for anyone else."

UnitType.Quote: 'Let Justice be done though the heaven may fall.'
UnitType.Backstory: "Heaven's gate is eternally closed, The path to god demolished for all time, Our wings to remind us of what we lost, Paradise was ill suited for us."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "Heaven's gate is eternally closed, The path to god demolished for all time, Our wings to remind us of what we lost, Paradise was ill suited for us."

UnitType.Quote: 'A thousand eyes in every corner, a poisoned fang in every back.'
UnitType.Backstory: "How long shall we Mourn in the dark? The bliss and the beauty will not return, Say farewell to sadness and grief, Though long and hard the road may be, Even in silence I hear the words, An oath we shall swear 'In the name of the one', Until the world's end, It can't be broken."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "How long shall we Mourn in the dark? The bliss and the beauty will not return, Say farewell to sadness and grief, Though long and hard the road may be, Even in silence I hear the words, An oath we shall swear 'In the name of the one', Until the world's end, It can't be broken."

UnitType.Quote: 'The open steppe, a clear day, a falcon on your wrist - that is living.'
UnitType.Backstory: "Charging the lines with the force of a storm, Fast as the lighting phantoms swarm 200 miles at nightfall, taken within a day, Thus earning their name, earning the fame."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "Charging the lines with the force of a storm, Fast as the lighting phantoms swarm 200 miles at nightfall, taken within a day, Thus earning their name, earning the fame."

UnitType.Quote: 'From Hell's hearth I stab at thee; for hate's sake I'll spit my last breath at thee.'
UnitType.Backstory: "Dark revelation and intimate vision, The seed of danger for makind's new dawn, Fear and illusion, the jar of pandora, A sentence so hard for the fate of the world."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "Dark revelation and intimate vision, The seed of danger for makind's new dawn, Fear and illusion, the jar of pandora, A sentence so hard for the fate of the world."

UnitType.Quote: 'We are not violent, but when life itself is threatened we respond accordingly.'
UnitType.Backstory: "To live again, We must grow again, To be like the acorn, We state with certainty, Though I may be just a small thing, I dream of mighty forests."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "To live again, We must grow again, To be like the acorn, We state with certainty, Though I may be just a small thing, I dream of mighty forests."

UnitType.Quote: 'With strange aeons even Death may end.'

UnitType.Backstory: "Men have good intentions on their way to the light. But some of them are venal and end up in the night. Maybe it's better for you, mankind, not to know what's going on."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "Men have good intentions on their way to the light. But some of them are venal and end up in the night. Maybe it's better for you, mankind, not to know what's going on."
UnitType.Quote: 'The brightest flame casts the darkest shadow, and the world is burning.'
'Mortal world turned to ice - there be our paradise!'
UnitType.Backstory:
"A human once asked what made our cause just. Vengeance for our sunken Land, to us, is the most noble of intentions.
The fundamental dynamics of the universe are with us to cover all the world in eternal frost where none but we live.
'What about humanity? A hundred thousand people who are not yet ready to die!' said the human. They damn well better be."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText:
"A human once asked what made our cause just. Vengeance for our sunken Land, to us, is the most noble of intentions.
The fundamental dynamics of the universe are with us to cover all the world in eternal frost where none but we live.
'What about humanity? A hundred thousand people who are not yet ready to die!' said the human. They damn well better be."

UnitType.Quote: 'Iron in the heart cannot be taken.'
UnitType.Backstory: "This is your point of no return, Now we are ready to strike, again, It's getting far too late, my friend, Let The Hammer Fall."
UnitType.LorebookIntroText: "This is your point of no return, Now we are ready to strike, again, It's getting far too late, my friend, Let The Hammer Fall."

UnitType.Quote: 'Humanity has bled in wars for four thousand years. What a waste of good blood...'
